model

Class FactSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.FactSet

  • public class FactSet
extends Object
    This class represents the updatable part of the database. This is the extensional clauses of the database.

    The facts are stored as SimpleSentence in a Map sorted by name.

    Author:
    Alexandre Camus

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFact(SimpleSentence fact)
      Adds the specified fact to the set, if the fact is not already true according to the method isTrue().

      • getFacts

        public Map<String,List<SimpleSentence>> getFacts()
        Gets the facts.
        Returns:
        the Map containing all the facts.

      • getFact

        public List<SimpleSentence> getFact(String name)
        Gets the facts corresponding to the name of the parameter.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the facts to get.
        Returns:
        an List of the facts of the name name existing in the set.

      • removeFacts

        public void removeFacts(Unifiable fact)
        Removes the fact specified in the parameter.
        Parameters:
        fact - the fact to remove.

      • isTrue

        public boolean isTrue(Unifiable fact)
        Checks if the specified fact can be made true in the set.

        The test is done thanks to the equal() function.

        Parameters:
        fact - that is checked if it is true in the set.
        Returns:
        true if it true in the set, otherwise false.

      • addFact

        public void addFact(SimpleSentence fact)
        Adds the specified fact to the set, if the fact is not already true according to the method isTrue().
        Parameters:
        fact - to add in the set.

      • toRuleSet

        public RuleSet toRuleSet()
        Creates a RuleSet object containing the facts as its rules.
        Returns:
        the RuleSet containing the facts.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns the set in the form of: "Facts: {factName=[factsOfThisName], otherName=[othersFacts]}".
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        See Also:
